麦蒔き: (むぎまき) - sowing wheat or barley
麦藁: (むぎわら) - wheat straw; barley straw
麦角菌: (バッカクキン) - ergot fungus (Claviceps purpurea)
麦酒: (ばくしゅ) - (sometimes read ビール)  beer
麦隴: (ばくろう) - field of grain (not rice)
麦飯: (むぎいい) - boiled barley and rice
麨: (はったい) - parched flour, esp. barley (can be drunk in hot water with sugar)
麨粉: (はったいこ) - parched flour, esp. barley
麩: (ふ) - Light Wheat-gluten Bread , wheat gluten (geralmente cozido no vapor ou assado)
麪包: (メンパオ) - (めんぽう was originally a military term; メンパオ is from the Chinese word "mianbao")  bread
麭: (ほう) - Sticky Rice Ball , round dumpling (feito de farinha de arroz, etc.)
麸: (ふ) - Pão de Trigo com Glúten Leve
麹: (きく) - Malte, kōji, arroz maltado, malte
麹塵: (きじん) - yellow-green tinged with grey; emperor's informal robes
麹塵の袍: (きくじんのほう) - emperor's informal robes
麹塵袍: (きくじんのほう) - emperor's informal robes
麹室: (こうじむろ) - room for producing kōji
麹漬: (こうじづけ) - fish, meat, vegetables, etc. pickled in mould (mold) and salt; food pickled in malted rice
麹漬け: (こうじづけ) - fish, meat, vegetables, etc. pickled in mould (mold) and salt; food pickled in malted rice
麺媽: (メンマ) - bamboo shoots boiled, sliced, fermented, dried or preserved in salt, then soaked in hot water and sea salt (chi: mianma)
麺麭: (めんぽう) - (めんぽう was originally a military term; メンパオ is from the Chinese word "mianbao")  bread
麺麻: (メンマ) - bamboo shoots boiled, sliced, fermented, dried or preserved in salt, then soaked in hot water and sea salt (chi: mianma)
麻: (ma/asa) - hemp , cannabis (Cannabis sativa), hemp (plant); hemp (fiber), linen, flax, jute
麻の中の蓬: (あさのなかのよもぎ) - if even the most crooked person is surrounded by good people, he will straighten up as does mugwort growing in a hemp field
麻ひも: (あさひも) - hemp cord; hemp twine
麻呂: (まろ) - I/me; (person having) thin or shaved eyebrows; (also 丸) affectionate suffix for names of young men or pets
麻姑: (まご) - Ma Gu/legendary Taoist immortal with long talon-like fingernails; backscratcher
麻姑掻痒: (まこそうよう) - (yoji) things happening exactly as one pleases (wishes); someone being very attentive to one's wishes
麻婆豆腐: (マーボードーフ) - mapo doufu (chi: mápó dòufu); mapo tofu; spicy Sichuan dish of tofu and minced meat
麻生派: (あそうは) - Aso Faction (of the LDP)
麻糸: (あさいと) - hemp yarn; linen thread
麻紐: (あさひも) - hemp cord; hemp twine
麻絲: (あさいと) - hemp yarn; linen thread
麻薬中毒: (まやくちゅうどく) - drug addiction
麻薬中毒者: (まやくちゅうどくしゃ) - drug addict; junkie
麻薬及び向精神薬取締法: (まやくおよびこうせいしんやくとりしまりほう) - Narcotics and Psychotropics Control Law
麻薬取引: (まやくとりひき) - drug deal; drug dealing; drug trafficking; drug trade
麻薬取引き: (まやくとりひき) - drug deal; drug dealing; drug trafficking; drug trade
麻薬取締法: (まやくとりしまりほう) - (Japanese) Narcotics Control Law
麻薬取締班: (まやくとりしまりはん) - narcotics squad; narc squad
麻薬問題担当長官: (まやくもんだいたんとうちょうかん) - drug czar; Director of the White House Office of National Drug Control Policy; ONDCP
麻薬密売: (まやくみつばい) - drug trafficking; dealing in illegal drugs
麻薬常用: (まやくじょうよう) - narcotic addiction
麻薬常用者: (まやくじょうようしゃ) - drug user or addict
麻薬常習: (まやくじょうしゅう) - drug addiction
麻薬性鎮痛薬: (まやくせいちんつうやく) - narcotic analgesic
麻薬探知犬: (まやくたんちけん) - drug-sniffing dog
麻薬組織: (まやくそしき) - drug cartel; drug ring; drug syndicate
